Class GPS

  • java.lang.Object

      • mods.GPS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Emulateable

    public class GPS
extends AbstractMod
implements Emulateable
    Author:
    arno A GPS-ased module. Tries matching the detected GPS coordinates to the best fitting map Node

      • getEstimates

        public LocationEstimationVector getEstimates(long timeStamp1,
                                    long timeStamp2)
        Description copied from interface: Emulateable
        Returns estimates on the Position of the user/device ! The mod itself has to decide if an entry of its data may fit better to the actual or next timestamp ! For example dataTimeStamp = 80, timeStamp1 = 1, timeStamp2 = 81 -> Should decide that dataTimeStamp is not used in most cases.
        Specified by:
        getEstimates in interface Emulateable
        Parameters:
        timeStamp1 - the actual concerning TimeStamp (FP-based)
        timeStamp2 - the upcoming TimeStamp (FP-Based)
        Returns:
        Estimates of the position
